name: Biomancy Genetic Engineering
author: Art, animation and design: Tecrys. Coding: Debido, LazyWizard, Sundog, Deathfly, Xenoargh, Mesotronik & Tartiflette. Sound: SniZupGun, freesfx.co.uk, zapsplat.com, freesound.org.
description: This mod introduces alien wildlife and the Biomancy Genetic Engineering faction developing ships on the bases of genetic material of said wildlife.
